tool_description: Un ensemble complet d'articles traitant des bienfaits du sport sur la santé (FR et EN).  Heroku : https://sportsandhealthapi.herokuapp.com/news
name: Sport Sante
title: Sport Sante

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about sports and health from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-sante.p.rapidapi.com/news/vidal"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-sante.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-sante.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-sante.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Sports Health News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about the good impact of sports on health.
